'''Spicy Stew''' is a [[Special Dish|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Cream Stew]] with [[Barbara]]. The [[recipe]] for Cream Stew is obtainable from [[Good Hunter]] for 2,500 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 25.

Spicy Stew decreases [[Stamina]] depleted by sprinting for all party members by '''25'''% for '''1500''' seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
